entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:14 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Partly cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the morning. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 12:14 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023
